translation.launchWithAlerts: Welcome to the financial application of <lang xml:lang="it-IT">Ideato</lang>. There are {{- alerts}} alerts to check. Do you want to check them now? You can also ask for your balance.
translation.launchWithNoAlerts: Welcome to the financial application of <lang xml:lang="it-IT">Ideato</lang>. There are no alerts, if you want you can ask for your account balance
translation.help: For now you can do nothing, Hakuna Matata!
translation.operationConfirmedWithAlerts: Operation Conffirmed. You have {{- alerts}} alerts left. Do you want to check the next one?
translation.operationConfirmedWithNoAlerts: Operation Conffirmed. You Don't have any more alerts
translation.error: Sorry, I can"t understand the command. Please say again.
translation.readBalanceWithAlerts: Your balance is of {{-totalMoney}} euros. There are {{- alerts}} alerts to check. Do you want to check them now?
translation.readBalanceWithNoAlerts: Il tuo saldo Ã¨ di {{-totalMoney}} euro. Bye Bye.
